task.title: Preparing Your Recipe
task.shortdesc: It is important to understand the proper way to prepare a recipe for this particular machine before attempting your first time.

step.cmd: Wash and dry the freezer bowl.
Freeze the freezer bowl completely before beginning your recipe; the usual time is between 12 and 24 hours. For optimal results, leave the freezer bowl in the back of the freezer at all times.
Shake the freezer bowl to find out whether it is completely frozen. If you do not hear any liquid moving inside, the cooling liquid is frozen.
Prepare ingredients in a container that is easy to pour from.
step.info: Make sure your ingredients yield 2 quarts or less.
Do NOT fill the freezer bowl higher than half an inch from the top.
